## HandlerContextType type

Extracts the type of the first argument of a [HandlerFunction](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.handlerfunction.md) to represent the type of the context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HandlerContextType<T extends HandlerFunction<any>> = T extends HandlerFunction<infer U> ? U : never;
```
